categories.name: Prayer Supplications
categories.description: Duas for different prayers and worship

categories.name: Daily Life
categories.description: Supplications for daily activities and routines

categories.name: Special Occasions
categories.description: Duas for special moments and events

supplications.title: Morning Remembrance
supplications.arabicText: أَصْبَحْنَا وَأَصْبَحَ الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
supplications.englishText: We have reached the morning and the dominion belongs to Allah, and all praise is for Allah. There is no god but Allah alone, with no partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things competent.
supplications.transliteration: Asbahna wa asbahal mulku lillah, wal hamdu lillah, la ilaha illa Allah wahdahu la sharika lah, lahul mulku wa lahul hamd wa huwa ala kulli shay'in qadeer.
supplications.context: Upon waking up in the morning

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "مَنْ قَالَ حِينَ يُصْبِحُ: أَصْبَحْنَا وَأَصْبَحَ الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، كَانَ لَهُ عَدْلَ رَقَبَةٍ مِنْ وَلَدِ إِسْمَاعِيلَ، وَكُتِبَتْ لَهُ عَشْرُ حَسَنَاتٍ، وَمُحِيَتْ عَنْهُ عَشْرُ سَيِّئَاتٍ، وَرُفِعَتْ لَهُ عَشْرُ دَرَجَاتٍ، وَكَانَ فِي حِرْزٍ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ حَتَّى يُمْسِيَ"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'Whoever says in the morning: We have reached the morning and the dominion belongs to Allah, and all praise is for Allah. There is no god but Allah alone, with no partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things competent - it will be equal to freeing a slave from the children of Ishmael, and ten good deeds will be written for him, and ten bad deeds will be erased from him, and ten degrees will be raised for him, and he will be protected from Satan until evening.'
hadithReference.context: This hadith describes the great reward for morning remembrance

supplications.title: Seeking Forgiveness
supplications.arabicText: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ
supplications.englishText: I seek forgiveness from Allah and repent to Him.
supplications.transliteration: Astaghfirullah wa atubu ilayh.

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "وَاللَّهِ إِنِّي لَأَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ فِي الْيَوْمِ أَكْثَرَ مِنْ سَبْعِينَ مَرَّةً"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'By Allah, I seek forgiveness from Allah and repent to Him more than seventy times a day.'
hadithReference.context: This hadith shows how frequently the Prophet ﷺ sought forgiveness

supplications.title: Praise and Gratitude
supplications.arabicText: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
supplications.englishText: All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
supplications.transliteration: Alhamdulillahi rabbil alameen.

supplications.title: Evening Remembrance
supplications.arabicText: أَمْسَيْنَا وَأَمْسَى الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
supplications.englishText: We have reached the evening and the dominion belongs to Allah, and all praise is for Allah. There is no god but Allah alone, with no partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things competent.
supplications.transliteration: Amsayna wa amsal mulku lillah, wal hamdu lillah, la ilaha illa Allah wahdahu la sharika lah, lahul mulku wa lahul hamd wa huwa ala kulli shay'in qadeer.

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "مَنْ قَالَ حِينَ يُمْسِي: أَمْسَيْنَا وَأَمْسَى الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، كَانَ لَهُ عَدْلَ رَقَبَةٍ مِنْ وَلَدِ إِسْمَاعِيلَ، وَكُتِبَتْ لَهُ عَشْرُ حَسَنَاتٍ، وَمُحِيَتْ عَنْهُ عَشْرُ سَيِّئَاتٍ، وَرُفِعَتْ لَهُ عَشْرُ دَرَجَاتٍ، وَكَانَ فِي حِرْزٍ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ حَتَّى يُصْبِحَ"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'Whoever says in the evening: We have reached the evening and the dominion belongs to Allah, and all praise is for Allah. There is no god but Allah alone, with no partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things competent - it will be equal to freeing a slave from the children of Ishmael, and ten good deeds will be written for him, and ten bad deeds will be erased from him, and ten degrees will be raised for him, and he will be protected from Satan until morning.'
hadithReference.context: This hadith describes the great reward for evening remembrance

supplications.title: Seeking Refuge
supplications.arabicText: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
supplications.englishText: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.
supplications.transliteration: A'udhu bi kalimatillahit tammati min sharri ma khalaq.

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "مَنْ قَالَ حِينَ يَأْوِي إِلَى فِرَاشِهِ: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ، لَمْ يَضُرَّهُ شَيْءٌ حَتَّى يُصْبِحَ"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'Whoever says when he goes to his bed: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created, nothing will harm him until morning.'
hadithReference.context: This hadith describes the protection gained from seeking refuge before sleeping

supplications.title: Before Prayer
supplications.arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ بَاعِدْ بَيْنِي وَبَيْنَ خَطَايَايَ كَمَا بَاعَدْتَ بَيْنَ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ
supplications.englishText: O Allah, distance me from my sins as You have distanced the East from the West.
supplications.transliteration: Allahumma ba'id bayni wa bayna khatayaya kama ba'adta baynal mashriqi wal maghrib.

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "إِذَا تَوَضَّأَ الْعَبْدُ الْمُسْلِمُ أَوِ الْمُؤْمِنُ فَغَسَلَ وَجْهَهُ خَرَجَ مِنْ وَجْهِهِ كُلُّ خَطِيئَةٍ نَظَرَ إِلَيْهَا بِعَيْنَيْهِ مَعَ الْمَاءِ أَوْ مَعَ آخِرِ قَطْرِ الْمَاءِ، فَإِذَا غَسَلَ يَدَيْهِ خَرَجَ مِنْ يَدَيْهِ كُلُّ خَطِيئَةٍ بَطَشَتْهَا يَدَاهُ مَعَ الْمَاءِ أَوْ مَعَ آخِرِ قَطْرِ الْمَاءِ، فَإِذَا غَسَلَ رِجْلَيْهِ خَرَجَتْ كُلُّ خَطِيئَةٍ مَشَتْهَا رِجْلَاهُ مَعَ الْمَاءِ أَوْ مَعَ آخِرِ قَطْرِ الْمَاءِ حَتَّى يَخْرُجَ نَقِيًّا مِنَ الذُّنُوبِ"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'When a Muslim or believer performs ablution and washes his face, every sin he looked at with his eyes comes out from his face with the water or with the last drop of water. When he washes his hands, every sin his hands committed comes out from his hands with the water or with the last drop of water. When he washes his feet, every sin his feet walked comes out from his feet with the water or with the last drop of water, until he comes out pure from sins.'
hadithReference.context: This hadith describes the spiritual purification achieved through proper ablution

supplications.title: After Prayer
supplications.arabicText: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، وَلَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ، وَاللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ
supplications.englishText: Glory be to Allah, and all praise is due to Allah, and there is no god but Allah, and Allah is the Greatest.
supplications.transliteration: Subhanallah, wal hamdulillah, wa la ilaha illa Allah, wallahu akbar.

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "مَنْ سَبَّحَ اللَّهَ فِي دُبُرِ كُلِّ صَلَاةٍ ثَلَاثًا وَثَلَاثِينَ، وَحَمِدَ اللَّهَ ثَلَاثًا وَثَلَاثِينَ، وَكَبَّرَ اللَّهَ ثَلَاثًا وَثَلَاثِينَ، فَتِلْكَ تِسْعَةٌ وَتِسْعُونَ، وَقَالَ تَمَامَ الْمِائَةِ: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، غُفِرَتْ خَطَايَاهُ وَإِنْ كَانَتْ مِثْلَ زَبَدِ الْبَحْرِ"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'Whoever glorifies Allah thirty-three times after each prayer, and praises Allah thirty-three times, and magnifies Allah thirty-three times, that is ninety-nine, and says to complete the hundred: There is no god but Allah alone, with no partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things competent - his sins will be forgiven even if they are like the foam of the sea.'
hadithReference.context: This hadith describes the great reward for dhikr after prayer

supplications.title: Before Eating
supplications.arabicText: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ
supplications.englishText: In the name of Allah.
supplications.transliteration: Bismillah.

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "إِذَا أَكَلَ أَحَدُكُمْ فَلْيَذْكُرِ اسْمَ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى، فَإِنْ نَسِيَ أَنْ يَذْكُرَ اسْمَ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى فِي أَوَّلِهِ فَلْيَقُلْ: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ أَوَّلَهُ وَآخِرَهُ"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'When one of you eats, let him mention the name of Allah. If he forgets to mention the name of Allah at the beginning, let him say: In the name of Allah at the beginning and the end.'
hadithReference.context: This hadith teaches the proper way to mention Allah before eating

supplications.title: After Eating
supplications.arabicText: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا وَجَعَلَنَا مُسْلِمِينَ
supplications.englishText: All praise is due to Allah who has fed us and given us drink and made us Muslims.
supplications.transliteration: Alhamdulillahil ladhi at'amana wa saqana wa ja'alana muslimeen.

supplications.title: Before Sleeping
supplications.arabicText: بِاسْمِكَ رَبِّي وَضَعْتُ جَنْبِي، وَبِكَ أَرْفَعُهُ، فَإِنْ أَمْسَكْتَ نَفْسِي فَارْحَمْهَا، وَإِنْ أَرْسَلْتَهَا فَاحْفَظْهَا بِمَا تَحْفَظُ بِهِ عِبَادَكَ الصَّالِحِينَ
supplications.englishText: In Your name, my Lord, I lie down and in Your name I rise, so if You should take my soul then have mercy upon it, and if You should return my soul then protect it in the manner You do so with Your righteous servants.
supplications.transliteration: Bismika rabbi wada'tu janbi, wa bika arfa'uh, fa in amsakta nafsi farhamha, wa in arsaltaha fahfazha bima tahfazu bihi ibadakas saliheen.

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "إِذَا أَوَى أَحَدُكُمْ إِلَى فِرَاشِهِ فَلْيَنْفُضْ فِرَاشَهُ بِدَاخِلَةِ إِزَارِهِ فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَدْرِي مَا خَلَفَهُ عَلَيْهِ، ثُمَّ يَقُولُ: بِاسْمِكَ رَبِّي وَضَعْتُ جَنْبِي، وَبِكَ أَرْفَعُهُ، فَإِنْ أَمْسَكْتَ نَفْسِي فَارْحَمْهَا، وَإِنْ أَرْسَلْتَهَا فَاحْفَظْهَا بِمَا تَحْفَظُ بِهِ عِبَادَكَ الصَّالِحِينَ"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'When one of you goes to his bed, let him dust off his bed with the inside of his garment, for he does not know what has come onto it after him. Then let him say: In Your name, my Lord, I lie down and in Your name I rise, so if You should take my soul then have mercy upon it, and if You should return my soul then protect it in the manner You do so with Your righteous servants.'
hadithReference.context: This hadith teaches the proper supplication and action before sleeping

supplications.title: Travel Supplication
supplications.arabicText: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ، وَإِنَّا إِلَى رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُونَ
supplications.englishText: Glory be to Him who has subjected this to us, and we were not able to do it. And indeed, to our Lord we will return.
supplications.transliteration: Subhanal ladhi sakhkhara lana hadha wa ma kunna lahu muqrineen, wa inna ila rabbina lamunqaliboon.

supplications.title: Wedding Supplication
supplications.arabicText: بَارَكَ اللَّهُ لَكَ وَبَارَكَ عَلَيْكَ وَجَمَعَ بَيْنَكُمَا فِي خَيْرٍ
supplications.englishText: May Allah bless you and bestow His blessings upon you and unite you both in goodness.
supplications.transliteration: Barakallahu laka wa baraka alayka wa jama'a baynakuma fi khayr.

supplications.title: Protection from Evil
supplications.arabicText: أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
supplications.englishText: I seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the accursed.
supplications.transliteration: A'udhu billahi minash shaytanir rajeem.
supplications.context: When feeling threatened or before important tasks

supplications.title: General Protection
supplications.arabicText: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ
supplications.englishText: Sufficient for me is Allah; there is no deity except Him. On Him I have relied, and He is the Lord of the Great Throne.
supplications.transliteration: Hasbiyallahu la ilaha illa huwa alayhi tawakkaltu wa huwa rabbul arshil azeem.

supplications.title: Seeking Forgiveness - Comprehensive
supplications.arabicText: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَتُبْ عَلَيَّ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ
supplications.englishText: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance, for You are the Accepter of Repentance, the Merciful.
supplications.transliteration: Rabbighfir li wa tub alayya innaka antat tawwabur raheem.

supplications.title: Gratitude for Blessings
supplications.arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ وَلَكَ الشُّكْرُ
supplications.englishText: O Allah, to You belongs all praise and to You belongs all gratitude.
supplications.transliteration: Allahumma lakal hamdu wa lakash shukr.

supplications.title: Supplication for Rain
supplications.arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ اسْقِنَا غَيْثًا مُغِيثًا مَرِيئًا مَرِيعًا نَافِعًا غَيْرَ ضَارٍّ عَاجِلًا غَيْرَ آجِلٍ
supplications.englishText: O Allah, give us beneficial rain, plentiful, beneficial, and not harmful, immediate and not delayed.
supplications.transliteration: Allahumma asqina ghaythan mughithan mari'an mari'an nafi'an ghayra darran ajilan ghayra ajilin.

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "اللَّهُمَّ اسْقِنَا غَيْثًا مُغِيثًا مَرِيئًا مَرِيعًا نَافِعًا غَيْرَ ضَارٍّ عَاجِلًا غَيْرَ آجِلٍ"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'O Allah, give us beneficial rain, plentiful, beneficial, and not harmful, immediate and not delayed.'
hadithReference.context: This supplication is used when praying for rain

supplications.title: Supplication for Travel
supplications.arabicText: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ وَإِنَّا إِلَى رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُونَ
supplications.englishText: Glory be to Him who has subjected this to us, and we were not able to do it. And indeed, to our Lord we will return.
supplications.transliteration: Subhanal ladhi sakhkhara lana hadha wa ma kunna lahu muqrineen, wa inna ila rabbina lamunqaliboon.
supplications.context: When traveling by any means of transportation

supplications.title: Supplication for Entering the Market
supplications.arabicText: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
supplications.englishText: There is no god but Allah alone, with no partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things competent.
supplications.transliteration: La ilaha illa Allah wahdahu la sharika lah, lahul mulku wa lahul hamd wa huwa ala kulli shay'in qadeer.
supplications.context: When entering a marketplace or shopping area

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "مَنْ دَخَلَ السُّوقَ فَقَالَ: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَهُ أَلْفَ أَلْفِ حَسَنَةٍ وَمَحَا عَنْهُ أَلْفَ أَلْفِ سَيِّئَةٍ"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'Whoever enters the marketplace and says: There is no god but Allah alone, with no partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is over all things competent - Allah will write for him a million good deeds and erase from him a million bad deeds.'
hadithReference.context: This supplication is recommended when entering markets

supplications.title: Supplication for Leaving Home
supplications.arabicText: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
supplications.englishText: In the name of Allah, I put my trust in Allah, and there is no power and no strength except with Allah.
supplications.transliteration: Bismillah tawakkaltu ala Allah wa la hawla wa la quwwata illa billah.
supplications.context: When leaving home for any purpose

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "إِذَا خَرَجَ الرَّجُلُ مِنْ بَيْتِهِ فَقَالَ: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ، قِيلَ لَهُ: هُدِيتَ وَكُفِيتَ وَوُقِيتَ"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'When a man leaves his house and says: In the name of Allah, I put my trust in Allah, and there is no power and no strength except with Allah - it is said to him: You are guided, provided for, and protected.'
hadithReference.context: This supplication is recommended when leaving home

supplications.title: Supplication for Entering Home
supplications.arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ الْمَوْلِجِ وَخَيْرَ الْمَخْرَجِ بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا وَعَلَى اللَّهِ رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
supplications.englishText: O Allah, I ask You for the best of entry and the best of exit. In the name of Allah we enter, and in the name of Allah we exit, and upon our Lord we rely.
supplications.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka khayral mawliji wa khayral makhraji bismillah walajna wa bismillah kharajna wa ala Allah rabbina tawakkana.

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "إِذَا دَخَلَ الرَّجُلُ بَيْتَهُ فَلْيَقُلْ: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ الْمَوْلِجِ وَخَيْرَ الْمَخْرَجِ بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا وَعَلَى اللَّهِ رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'When a man enters his house, let him say: O Allah, I ask You for the best of entry and the best of exit. In the name of Allah we enter, and in the name of Allah we exit, and upon our Lord we rely.'
hadithReference.context: This supplication is recommended when entering home

supplications.title: Supplication for Wearing New Clothes
supplications.arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ كَسَوْتَنِيهِ، أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَهُ وَخَيْرَ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهِ وَشَرِّ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ
supplications.englishText: O Allah, to You belongs all praise. You have clothed me with it. I ask You for its good and the good of what it was made for, and I seek refuge with You from its evil and the evil of what it was made for.
supplications.transliteration: Allahumma lakal hamdu anta kasawtanihi, as'aluka khayrahu wa khayra ma suni'a lah, wa a'udhu bika min sharrihi wa sharri ma suni'a lah.

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "إِذَا لَبِسَ أَحَدُكُمْ ثَوْبًا جَدِيدًا فَلْيَقُلْ: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ كَسَوْتَنِيهِ، أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَهُ وَخَيْرَ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهِ وَشَرِّ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'When one of you wears a new garment, let him say: O Allah, to You belongs all praise. You have clothed me with it. I ask You for its good and the good of what it was made for, and I seek refuge with You from its evil and the evil of what it was made for.'
hadithReference.context: This supplication is recommended when wearing new clothes

supplications.title: Supplication for Looking in the Mirror
supplications.arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ كَمَا حَسَّنْتَ خَلْقِي فَحَسِّنْ خُلُقِي
supplications.englishText: O Allah, as You have beautified my physical form, beautify my character.
supplications.transliteration: Allahumma kama hassanta khalqi fa hassin khuluqi.

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "إِذَا نَظَرَ أَحَدُكُمْ فِي الْمِرْآةِ فَلْيَقُلْ: اللَّهُمَّ كَمَا حَسَّنْتَ خَلْقِي فَحَسِّنْ خُلُقِي"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'When one of you looks in the mirror, let him say: O Allah, as You have beautified my physical form, beautify my character.'
hadithReference.context: This supplication is recommended when looking in the mirror

supplications.title: Supplication for Entering the Bathroom
supplications.arabicText: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبُثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
supplications.englishText: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from male and female devils.
supplications.transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min al-khubuthi wal khaba'ith.
supplications.context: Before entering the bathroom or toilet

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "إِذَا دَخَلَ أَحَدُكُمْ الْخَلَاءَ فَلْيَقُلْ: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبُثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'When one of you enters the toilet, let him say: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from male and female devils.'
hadithReference.context: This supplication is recommended before entering the bathroom

supplications.title: Supplication for Leaving the Bathroom
supplications.arabicText: غُفْرَانَكَ
supplications.englishText: I seek Your forgiveness.
supplications.transliteration: Ghufranak.
supplications.context: When leaving the bathroom or toilet

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "إِذَا خَرَجَ أَحَدُكُمْ مِنَ الْخَلَاءِ فَلْيَقُلْ: غُفْرَانَكَ"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'When one of you leaves the toilet, let him say: I seek Your forgiveness.'
hadithReference.context: This supplication is recommended when leaving the bathroom

supplications.title: Supplication for Sneezing
supplications.arabicText: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
supplications.englishText: All praise is due to Allah.
supplications.transliteration: Alhamdulillah.

hadithReference.arabicText: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ: "إِذَا عَطَسَ أَحَدُكُمْ فَلْيَقُلْ: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، وَلْيَقُلْ لَهُ أَخُوهُ أَوْ صَاحِبُهُ: يَرْحَمُكَ اللَّهُ، فَإِذَا قَالَ لَهُ: يَرْحَمُكَ اللَّهُ، فَلْيَقُلْ: يَهْدِيكُمُ اللَّهُ وَيُصْلِحُ بَالَكُمْ"
hadithReference.englishText: The Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him) said: 'When one of you sneezes, let him say: All praise is due to Allah. And let his brother or companion say to him: May Allah have mercy on you. When he says to him: May Allah have mercy on you, let him say: May Allah guide you and set your affairs right.'
hadithReference.context: This supplication is recommended when sneezing
